name: SquidBoy (& StarFace)
description:
SquidBoy (& StarFace) is a small game made for the LD40, which had the theme "the more you have, the worse it is".

The theme is implemented by giving the player not just control over a
single ship as is common in normal shmups, but giving the player
control over two ships at once, having a shared lifepool. This means,
you as a player, have to navigate through a maze of bullets with not
just one, but two ships at a time! Good luck!

Story Setting

In the game, you play as two of your favorite seacreatures. SquidFace is a young and adventurous squid who isn't afraid of getting into trouble. StarFace is his shy friend, who'd rather not be starring in the game but didn't have a choice. On one of their peaceful strolls, they butt into the Bloody Hornbeak, a local bully, catching him off-guard without croonies. An epic fight ensues!

Features
  • Dual controls shoot-em-up bullet hell. Intended to play solo, but if too hard can be played by two players.
  • Epic multi-stage boss battle, will you defeat him?
  • Supports controller and keyboard controls, at the same time!
  • Various patterns to navigate through and get obliterated by!
Controls

SquidBoy

  • KEYBOARD: WASD or QZSD
  • GAMEPAD: Left Analog Stick

StarFace

  • KEYBOARD: Arrowkeys
  • GAMEPAD: Right Analog Stick

Shooting is done automatically!
